body.name: Pac-Kit 7-009 5-Piece Eye Flush Kit with 1 Oz. Eye Wash Solution, 2 Eye Pads and 2 Adhesive Strips

byLineInfo.name: Visit the First Aid Only Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 23 mins
features: Eye Wash Kit: Includes a 1-oz. bottle of emergency eyewash solution, 2 sterile oval eye pads, and 2 adhesive strips
Eye Wash Fluid: Composed of 98.3% purified water, our ophthalmic eye rinse helps relieve dryness, burning, and irritation by removing loose foreign material and moisturizing the eyes
Adhesive Strips and Eye Pads: Oval eye pads measure 1.7 in by 2.62 in (4.25 cm by 6.79 cm); 2 included adhesive strips can be used to comfortably secure the eye pad in place
Ideal For: This emergency eye wash kit makes a great addition to first aid kits, but can also be used in standalone applications

Personal and Professional First Aid Solutions: First Aid Only offers a full line of first aid kits, cabinets, and stations, Emergency Response Care, individual first aid products, Spill Clean Up kits, CPR care and more
body.description: Pac-Kit 5-piece first aid eye wash kit includes 1-oz. eye wash bottle for irrigating the eyes, 2 eye pads, and 2 adhesive strips. This eye cleaner kit makes a great addition to any first aid kit. It’s also perfect for standalone first aid applications or refilling a kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us First Aid Only, an Acme United Corporation brand, is the trusted provider of cost effective first aid solutions for individuals and businesses in every industry no matter how big or small. Over the last 150 years, Acme United has acquired the first aid companies Pac-Kit, PhysiciansCare and First Aid Only, to provide the first aid solutions to our customers. First Aid Only has been helping businesses stay in compliance with federally mandated First Aid and safety regulations since 1988. Based on our years of experience, we make easy for you the first aid kit that best serves your business needs and number of employees. We offer solutions for single building sites, multi-sites or mobile operations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Component to Emergency First Aid Kit
reviews.reviewText: I am a former EMT and Combat Medic; I keep well stocked emergency kits in my automobile, home, and workshop. Eye flush & patches are essential components to them and must be replaced every few years to ensure freshness. A small price to pay for life-saving equipment if needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good addition to first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: I added this to our travel first aid key. It was sealed and in good condition and expiration date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep and EYE on things
reviews.reviewText: Great addition to my medical kit for my BOB, SHTF, etc...I love this because all of us have eye issues and well when you get something in your eye or your eye gets harmed; it is nice to have a wash available to get the toxins out.This is a small box that has everything you need, to clear and clean an eye that has been harmed.I would advise anyone to have this for their medical kit. Be it for camping, hiking, or bugging out.Many Blessings,)o(CMD

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good to have
reviews.reviewText: I got this to add to my emergency first aid kit after realizing I had nothing for this. It’s a nice little set and I love that it comes wrapped in plastic as well as boxed. It was kind of dented but it still looks good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to first aid kits
reviews.reviewText: This is a great but often overlooked addition to any first aid kit. Highly recommend buying! Your kit won't be complete without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good To Have On Hand
reviews.reviewText: Although I haven't needed to use this First Aid Eye Wash Kit,I am pleased to have it available should I or anyone in our family have need of it.Dust fragments, errant no-see-um bugs that swarm in summer, or a splash from somethingthat irritates the eyes could happen in an instant so having the eye wash kit on hand is a plus.You can't use what you don't have. Having had eye implants in 2014 and recently having had a chalazioncyst I am especially sensitive to issues dealing with eyes. ~ The Boss and me, Mrs. B.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what you’ll need to add to your first aid kit as an eye wash station, so to speak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best price on Amazon.
reviews.reviewText: Great price! This is exactly what we were needing for our company medicine cabinet.
